Colorscheme: goodnight.vim

  • Modified version of Base16 Tomorrow Night which the name is meant to reference
  • I'm constantly tweaking this
  • Philosophy: uniform color scheme for all command line utilities
  • Refer to base16 styling guidelines when in doubt
256 color terminal Base16 Color Hex Purpose
0 Base00 ________________ #171919 Normal bg
1 Base08 ________________ #cc6666
2 Base0B ________________ #b5bd68
3 Base0A ________________ #f0c674
4 Base0D ________________ #81a2be
5 Base0E ________________ #b294bb
6 Base0C ________________ #8abeb7
7 Base05 ________________ #d3d3d3 Normal fg
8 Base03 ________________ #5f6160 Comment
9 - ________________ #cc6666
10 - ________________ #b5bd68

12 - ________________ #81a2be
13 - ________________ #b294bb
14 - ________________ #8abeb7

18 Base01 ________________ #222525 Statusline/border bg
19 Base02 ________________ #313438 Selection (visual mode bg)
20 Base04 ________________ #656e6e Statusline label (non-active window).
21 Base06 ________________ #eaeaea
22 ________________ #383838 Line number (non-active line).
23 ________________ #2a2c2d Tmux status bar and borders (not used in Vim).
